subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams won the Zurich Open on Sunday for her second singles title of the season. Williams beat Flavia Pennetta, 7-6 (1), 6-2, to take the tournament she last won in 1999. The victory should seal the 28-year-old Williams’s place at the season-ending WTA Tour Championship next month in Doha, Qatar.
